verses.verse: Paul, <S%G3972><s%> an apostle <S%G652><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the commandment <S%G2003><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Savior, <S%G4990><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2962><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> hope; <S%G1680><s%>

to Timothy, <S%G5095><s%> my true <S%G1103><s%> child <S%G5043><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> faith: <S%G4102><s%> Grace, <S%G5485><s%> mercy, <S%G1656><s%> and peace, <S%G1515><s%> from <S%G575><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

As <S%G2531><s%> I urged <S%G3870><s%> you <S%G4571><s%> when I was going <S%G4198><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Macedonia, <S%G3109><s%> stay <S%G4357><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> Ephesus <S%G2181><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> you might command <S%G3853><s%> certain <S%G5100><s%> men not <S%G3361><s%> to teach <S%G2085><s%> a different doctrine, <S%G2085><s%>

neither <S%G3366><s%> to pay attention to <S%G4337><s%> myths <S%G3454><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> endless <S%G562><s%> genealogies, <S%G1076><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> cause <S%G3930><s%> disputes, <S%G2214><s%> rather <S%G3123><s%> than <S%G2228><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>'s stewardship, <S%G3620><s%> which is <S%G3588><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%>â€”

but <S%G1161><s%> the goal <S%G5056><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> this command <S%G3852><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> love, <S%G1537><s%> out of a pure <S%G2513><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> a good <S%G18><s%> conscience <S%G4893><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sincere <S%G505><s%> faith; <S%G4102><s%>
from which <S%G3739><s%> things some, <S%G5100><s%> having missed the mark, <S%G795><s%> have turned aside <S%G1624><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> vain talking; <S%G3150><s%>

desiring <S%G2309><s%> to be <S%G1511><s%> teachers of the law, <S%G3547><s%> though they understand <S%G3539><s%> neither <S%G3383><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> they say, <S%G3004><s%> nor <S%G3383><s%> about what <S%G3739><s%> they strongly affirm. <S%G1226><s%>
But <S%G1161><s%> we know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> is good, <S%G2570><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> a man <S%G5100><s%> uses <S%G5530><s%> it <S%G846><s%> lawfully, <S%G3545><s%>

as knowing <S%G1492><s%> this, <S%G5124><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> law <S%G3551><s%> is <S%G2749><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> made for <S%G2749><s%> a righteous man, <S%G1342><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> for the lawless <S%G459><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> insubordinate, <S%G506><s%> for the ungodly <S%G765><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sinners, <S%G268><s%> for the unholy <S%G462><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> profane, <S%G952><s%> for murderers of fathers <S%G3964><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> murderers of mothers, <S%G3389><s%> for manslayers, <S%G409><s%>

for the sexually immoral, <S%G4205><s%> for homosexuals, <S%G733><s%> for slave-traders, <S%G405><s%> for liars, <S%G5583><s%> for perjurers, <S%G1965><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> for <S%G480><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> other <S%G480><s%> thing <S%G2087><s%> contrary to <S%G480><s%> the sound <S%G5198><s%> doctrine; <S%G1319><s%>

according to <S%G2596><s%> the Good News <S%G2098><s%> of the glory <S%G1391><s%> of the blessed <S%G3107><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> was committed to <S%G4100><s%> my <S%G1473><s%> trust. <S%G4100><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G2192><s%> thank <S%G5485><s%> him who enabled <S%G1743><s%> me, <S%G3165><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> he counted <S%G2233><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> faithful, <S%G4103><s%> appointing me <S%G5087><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> service; <S%G1248><s%>

although I was <S%G5607><s%> before <S%G4386><s%> a blasphemer, <S%G989><s%> a <S%G2532><s%> persecutor, <S%G1376><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> insolent. <S%G5197><s%> However, <S%G235><s%> I obtained mercy, <S%G1653><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> I did <S%G4160><s%> it ignorantly <S%G50><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> unbelief. <S%G570><s%>

The <S%G1161><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> abounded <S%G5250><s%> exceedingly with <S%G3326><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> love <S%G26><s%> which is <S%G3588><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> saying <S%G3056><s%> is faithful <S%G4103><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> worthy <S%G514><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> acceptance, <S%G594><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> to save <S%G4982><s%> sinners; <S%G268><s%> of whom <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> chief. <S%G4413><s%>

However, <S%G235><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> this cause <S%G5124><s%> I obtained mercy, <S%G1653><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> me <S%G1698><s%> first, <S%G4413><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> might display <S%G1731><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> his patience, <S%G4314><s%> for an example <S%G5296><s%> of those who were going <S%G3195><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> believe <S%G4100><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> him <S%G846><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> life. <S%G2222><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> to the King <S%G935><s%> eternal, <S%G165><s%> immortal, <S%G862><s%> invisible, <S%G517><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%> who alone <S%G3441><s%> is wise, <S%G4680><s%> be honor <S%G5092><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> forever <S%G165><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> ever. <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>

This <S%G3778><s%> instruction <S%G3852><s%> I commit <S%G3908><s%> to <S%G2596><s%> you, <S%G4671><s%> my child <S%G5043><s%> Timothy, <S%G5095><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> the prophecies <S%G4394><s%> which led <S%G4254><s%> the way <S%G1909><s%> to you, <S%G4571><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> them <S%G846><s%> you may wage <S%G4754><s%> the good <S%G2570><s%> warfare; <S%G4754><s%>

holding <S%G2192><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> a good <S%G18><s%> conscience; <S%G4893><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> having thrust away <S%G683><s%> made a shipwreck <S%G3489><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> the faith; <S%G4102><s%>

of whom <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> Hymenaeus <S%G5211><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Alexander; <S%G223><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> I delivered <S%G3860><s%> to Satan, <S%G4567><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> they might be taught <S%G3811><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> to blaspheme. <S%G987><s%>
